definition: A term commonly employed to refer to discarded or unwanted items, typically used to describe various forms of waste materials generated by human activities. It encompasses various types of refuse, garbage, or rubbish, and is often used to denote the contents of trash cans, bins, or landfills.

examples.german: Bitte werfen Sie keinen Müll auf die Straße.
examples.english: Please do not throw trash on the street.
The garbage collection will come early tomorrow.
